thread.title: Different!
thread.title_full: Different! - Review of Shichahai Shadow Art Performance Hotel, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: Gerry H
title: Different!
text:
Getting to the hotel was an experience in itself! First impressions were not favourable, but as the saying goes...never judge a book by its cover. The staff at the hotel were very good, they were always willing to help with any problem or enquiry. Rooms were more than adequate for our needs and the meals provided were very good.
